name: RollerPlay
detailed_description: Rollerplay is runner made for VR. We have designed it in a way to avoid motion sickness, while taking nothing away from the excitement. Great for exercise in VR. Try our free demo! You can also play the game in non-VR with a controller or keyboard. No micro-transactions. No pay to win. Skills based scores only.
